b0f2489b-2ff2-42fe-ad4e-1d6e13e9d40a.name: Ion Cannon Turret
b0f2489b-2ff2-42fe-ad4e-1d6e13e9d40a.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

If this attack hits the target ship, the ship suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

e4740805-feb4-4d23-9e5e-54e467e099d9.name: Proton Torpedoes
e4740805-feb4-4d23-9e5e-54e467e099d9.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

You may change 1 of your results to a result.

562fa221-dc48-4ee9-b0bc-ae3989a7e95d.name: R2 Astromech
562fa221-dc48-4ee9-b0bc-ae3989a7e95d.text: You may treat all 1- and 2-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

c5315e44-4f98-4d13-ba04-bd6ef5cb2266.name: R2-D2
c5315e44-4f98-4d13-ba04-bd6ef5cb2266.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

037ac23f-482e-4c12-9cc0-4327d7bfae7a.name: R2-F2
037ac23f-482e-4c12-9cc0-4327d7bfae7a.text: Action: Increase your agility value by 1 until the end of this game round.

b10be0c8-d1c7-445f-918b-96caf0245877.name: R5-D8
b10be0c8-d1c7-445f-918b-96caf0245877.text:
Action: Roll 1 defense die.

On a or result, discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards.

0775d4d8-b504-4a15-8100-cf2151ad753e.name: R5-K6
0775d4d8-b504-4a15-8100-cf2151ad753e.text:
After spending your target lock, roll 1 defense die.

On a result, immediately acquire a target lock on that same ship. You cannot spend this target lock during this attack.

5da6c226-e9ed-4c8e-a902-3aa64693d339.name: R5 Astromech
5da6c226-e9ed-4c8e-a902-3aa64693d339.text: During the End phase, you may choose 1 of your faceup Damage cards with the Ship trait and flip it facedown.

12c94c9c-75eb-4b5c-a9d4-9f8de3b327dc.name: Determination
12c94c9c-75eb-4b5c-a9d4-9f8de3b327dc.text: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card with the Pilot trait, discard it immediately without resolving its effect.

edef4363-ae1d-456e-b693-52b76406f452.name: Swarm Tactics
edef4363-ae1d-456e-b693-52b76406f452.text:
At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1.

Until the end of this phase, treat the chosen ship as if its pilot skill were equal to your pilot skill.

5732914d-4a99-42b2-bf9b-728ccfa7d806.name: Squad Leader
5732914d-4a99-42b2-bf9b-728ccfa7d806.text:
Action: Choose 1 ship at Range 1-2 that has a lower pilot skill than you.

The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free action.

c29b01a7-3b61-4990-9069-3919694ed485.name: Expert Handling
c29b01a7-3b61-4990-9069-3919694ed485.text:
Action: Perform a free barrel roll action. If you do not have the action icon, receive 1 stress token.

You may then remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

55745c88-18b3-4c54-b736-b13ed6ab89ef.name: Marksmanship
55745c88-18b3-4c54-b736-b13ed6ab89ef.text: Action: When attacking this round, you may change 1 of your results to a result and all of your other results to results.

7ff963d3-0526-4cd0-8bf4-bc3bb5ac5000.name: Concussion Missiles
7ff963d3-0526-4cd0-8bf4-bc3bb5ac5000.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

You may change 1 of your blank results to a result.

5330f85e-78e3-4ec4-bae7-c8455a11721f.name: Cluster Missiles
5330f85e-78e3-4ec4-bae7-c8455a11721f.text: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack twice.

7e40a79b-785d-4b54-99fa-91107a0d6095.name: Daredevil
7e40a79b-785d-4b54-99fa-91107a0d6095.text:
Action: Execute a white ( 1) or ( 1) maneuver. Then, receive 1 stress token.

Then, if you do not have the action icon, roll 2 attack dice. Suffer any damage () and any critical damage () rolled.

67b4fe3d-d9f5-4418-844b-adbb13de7d1e.name: Elusiveness
67b4fe3d-d9f5-4418-844b-adbb13de7d1e.text:
When defending, you may receive 1 stress token to choose 1 attack die. The attacker must reroll that die.

If you have at least 1 stress token, you cannot use this ability.

88f0b16c-0da5-414e-848a-3f1abf38c780.name: Homing Missiles
88f0b16c-0da5-414e-848a-3f1abf38c780.text:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

The defender cannot spend evade tokens during this attack.

3204b803-85f8-4094-aac0-a9b12a4c7959.name: Push the Limit
3204b803-85f8-4094-aac0-a9b12a4c7959.text:
Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action shown in your action bar.

Then receive 1 stress token.

0d4a62a7-4cda-44b3-b172-3f95fd2fcd37.name: Deadeye
0d4a62a7-4cda-44b3-b172-3f95fd2fcd37.text:
You may treat the Attack (target lock): header as Attack (focus):.

When an attack instructs you to spend a target lock, you may spend a focus token instead.

9c3f4a29-0ef2-493a-9f4b-7caec2fc5291.name: Expose
9c3f4a29-0ef2-493a-9f4b-7caec2fc5291.text: Action: Until the end of the round, increase your primary weapon value by 1 and decrease your agility value by 1.

3af6b8fe-5e2c-4cb4-b49d-c1359bed6217.name: Gunner
3af6b8fe-5e2c-4cb4-b49d-c1359bed6217.text: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack.  You cannot perform another attack this round.

64fd1f19-0cb4-4424-9c27-c5a0cd7ec197.name: Ion Cannon
64fd1f19-0cb4-4424-9c27-c5a0cd7ec197.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

9168f433-00bb-4485-bced-c019d8c50c27.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
9168f433-00bb-4485-bced-c019d8c50c27.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

Immediately after rolling your attack dice, you must change all of your results to results.

d72bba26-ca5a-4d4d-95f5-092653bdfbfd.name: Seismic Charges
d72bba26-ca5a-4d4d-95f5-092653bdfbfd.text:
When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 seismic charge token.

This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

Seismic Charge Token: When this bomb token detonates, each ship at Range 1 of the token suffers 1 damage. Then discard this token.

93e1b5e3-17a0-45c1-ae18-c289ad596e36.name: Mercenary Copilot
93e1b5e3-17a0-45c1-ae18-c289ad596e36.text: When attacking at Range 3, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

e1251748-df4b-44c0-95a3-7d66292d25b6.name: Assault Missiles
e1251748-df4b-44c0-95a3-7d66292d25b6.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, each other ship at Range 1 of the defender suffers 1 damage.

3cf29863-1534-4117-82b5-86de73954a81.name: Veteran Instincts
3cf29863-1534-4117-82b5-86de73954a81.text: Increase your pilot skill value by 2.

6a6215c1-c851-4120-8c42-379d8e39c3db.name: Proximity Mines
6a6215c1-c851-4120-8c42-379d8e39c3db.text:
Action: Discard this card to drop 1 proximity mine token.

When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token detonates.

Proximity Mine Token: When this bomb token detonates, the ship that moved through or overlapped this token rolls 3 attack dice and suffers all damage () and critical damage () rolled. Then discard this token.

c8a0b885-7f92-4eef-89e0-86861495b065.name: Weapons Engineer
c8a0b885-7f92-4eef-89e0-86861495b065.text:
You may maintain 2 target locks (only 1 per enemy ship).

When you acquire a target lock, you may lock onto 2 different ships.

01e4327d-8168-4c6a-87ed-b47d5297d7aa.name: Draw Their Fire
01e4327d-8168-4c6a-87ed-b47d5297d7aa.text: When a friendly ship at Range 1 is hit by an attack, you may suffer 1 of the uncanceled results instead of the target ship.

9fb6837f-93ac-45d5-8fdf-b215c068e9d1.name: Luke Skywalker
9fb6837f-93ac-45d5-8fdf-b215c068e9d1.text:
Rebel only.

After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You may change 1 result to a result. You cannot perform another attack this round.

b874552e-8f9a-4c5b-be16-27f3de705a0c.name: Nien Nunb
b874552e-8f9a-4c5b-be16-27f3de705a0c.text:
Rebel only.

You may treat all maneuvers as green maneuvers.

be37e6e7-99fc-47ab-b2ca-df25ff9c5762.name: Chewbacca
be37e6e7-99fc-47ab-b2ca-df25ff9c5762.text:
Rebel only.

When you are dealt a Damage card, you may immediately discard that card and recover 1 shield.

Then, discard this Upgrade card.

a646866e-a6b2-4126-b0cd-622e36dcc8cb.name: Advanced Proton Torpedoes
a646866e-a6b2-4126-b0cd-622e36dcc8cb.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

You may change up to 3 of your blank results to results.

5126b6bb-72c3-47d2-9f5f-bd4237fc62ef.name: Autoblaster
5126b6bb-72c3-47d2-9f5f-bd4237fc62ef.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

Your results cannot be canceled by defense dice.

The defender may cancel results before results.

5b98bdf4-993b-4b69-b3d7-b86c094a1857.name: Fire-Control System
5b98bdf4-993b-4b69-b3d7-b86c094a1857.text: After you perform an attack, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

5ee768c6-51ef-401d-bc3a-02471c5e097e.name: Blaster Turret
5ee768c6-51ef-401d-bc3a-02471c5e097e.text: Attack (focus): Spend 1 focus token to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

9e7a3554-e45f-49be-afd9-13fadeee3c3b.name: Recon Specialist
9e7a3554-e45f-49be-afd9-13fadeee3c3b.text: When you perform a focus action, assign 1 additional focus token to your ship.

d953765b-c0fa-4a72-8c08-7a775f9a133b.name: Saboteur
d953765b-c0fa-4a72-8c08-7a775f9a133b.text: Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 and roll 1 attack die. On a or result, choose 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to that ship, flip it faceup, and resolve it.

81c583c8-fde8-4b5f-ae4f-23be4cddc7da.name: Intelligence Agent
81c583c8-fde8-4b5f-ae4f-23be4cddc7da.text: At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2.  You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver.

d6b06a4b-9b64-4a36-94d7-f14034ca6b81.name: Proton Bombs
d6b06a4b-9b64-4a36-94d7-f14034ca6b81.text:
When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 proton bomb token.

This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

Proton Bomb Token: When this bomb token detonates, deal 1 faceup Damage card to each ship at Range 1 of the token. Then discard this token.

cba8a6c8-53dd-4b34-82d6-0de8eb7db296.name: Adrenaline Rush
cba8a6c8-53dd-4b34-82d6-0de8eb7db296.text: When you reveal a red maneuver, you may discard this card to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the Activation phase.

404e25b8-485f-4933-acc0-c1084bfc5ce6.name: Advanced Sensors
404e25b8-485f-4933-acc0-c1084bfc5ce6.text:
Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform 1 free action.

If you use this ability, you must skip your "Perform Action" step during this round.

72174ccf-144c-46e0-ae81-12c608214849.name: Sensor Jammer
72174ccf-144c-46e0-ae81-12c608214849.text:
When defending, you may change 1 of the attacker's results into a result.

The attacker cannot reroll the die with the changed result.

4b5582f3-653e-4066-8a97-95fcccea1624.name: Darth Vader
4b5582f3-653e-4066-8a97-95fcccea1624.text:
Imperial only.

After you perform an attack against an enemy ship, you may suffer 2 damage to cause that ship to suffer 1 critical damage.

2763c30c-721f-43f4-b13d-a13856ef4d60.name: Rebel Captive
2763c30c-721f-43f4-b13d-a13856ef4d60.text:
Imperial only.

Once per round, the first ship that declares you as the target of an attack immediately receives 1 stress token.

12adf7e7-64a3-4080-a5a5-1dfbd81ccc54.name: Flight Instructor
12adf7e7-64a3-4080-a5a5-1dfbd81ccc54.text: When defending, you may reroll 1 of your results. If the attacker's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may reroll 1 of your blank results instead.

09b250fb-f625-4480-9456-86cedebdba8e.name: Navigator
09b250fb-f625-4480-9456-86cedebdba8e.text:
When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same bearing.

You cannot rotate to a red maneuver if you have any stress tokens.

c0f00fe4-da29-4aba-b952-d0bdfde0cecf.name: Opportunist
c0f00fe4-da29-4aba-b952-d0bdfde0cecf.text:
When attacking, if the defender does not have any focus or evade tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.

You cannot use this ability if you have any stress tokens.

26c6fa13-8024-4b21-8768-5d34b6c9a0ab.name: Comms Booster
26c6fa13-8024-4b21-8768-5d34b6c9a0ab.text: Energy: Spend 1 energy to remove all stress tokens from a friendly ship at Range 1-3. Then assign 1 focus token to that ship.

78563976-0169-43ca-b0d2-89bbeb705b46.name: Slicer Tools
78563976-0169-43ca-b0d2-89bbeb705b46.text: Action: Choose 1 or more ships at Range 1-3 that have a stress token. For each ship chosen, you may spend 1 energy to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

f4f6c519-c6c9-437a-84ad-92eff6dc6866.name: Shield Projector
f4f6c519-c6c9-437a-84ad-92eff6dc6866.text: When an enemy ship is declaring either a small or large ship as the target of its attack, you may spend 3 energy to force that ship to target you if possible.

c76234e8-44f0-4184-9c03-5f6485c2df85.name: Ion Pulse Missiles
c76234e8-44f0-4184-9c03-5f6485c2df85.text:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 2 ion tokens. Then cancel all dice results.

969a7bae-4035-4e5e-b42e-d42a9e6bcc20.name: Wingman
969a7bae-4035-4e5e-b42e-d42a9e6bcc20.text: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from another friendly ship at Range 1.

021e3d0d-87ab-42f8-8c5b-b262ee92aa08.name: Decoy
021e3d0d-87ab-42f8-8c5b-b262ee92aa08.text: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2.  Exchange your pilot skill with that ship's pilot skill until the end of the phase.

1e57ef89-30ee-498e-94e2-ce6150cfeb58.name: Outmaneuver
1e57ef89-30ee-498e-94e2-ce6150cfeb58.text: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, if you are not inside that ship's firing arc, reduce its agility value by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

c48750f9-5664-4ac0-9cd3-5d45d5ddcd48.name: Predator
c48750f9-5664-4ac0-9cd3-5d45d5ddcd48.text: When attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die.  If the defender's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may instead reroll up to 2 attack dice.

df430484-9ac3-4035-b300-9f38824d409c.name: Flechette Torpedoes
df430484-9ac3-4035-b300-9f38824d409c.text:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card and spend your target lock to perform this attack.

After you perform this attack, the defender receives 1 stress token if its hull value is "4" or lower.

93ea0904-0312-4a31-8e97-da466713895c.name: R7 Astromech
93ea0904-0312-4a31-8e97-da466713895c.text: Once per round when defending, if you have a target lock on the attacker, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all attack dice.  The attacker must reroll the chosen dice.

bd3aaa22-7772-4762-b103-81816b6e43f4.name: R7-T1
bd3aaa22-7772-4762-b103-81816b6e43f4.text: Action: Choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2. If you are inside that ship's firing arc, you may acquire a target lock on that ship. Then, you may perform a free boost action.

1c7c7e46-c5e5-49eb-8f53-e09f8451a2f5.name: Tactician
1c7c7e46-c5e5-49eb-8f53-e09f8451a2f5.text: After you perform an attack against a ship inside your firing arc at Range 2, that ship receives 1 stress token.

6bdef52c-de97-4240-85a7-9b2938dbaad2.name: R2-D2 (Crew)
6bdef52c-de97-4240-85a7-9b2938dbaad2.text:
Rebel only.

At the end of the End phase, if you have no shields, you may recover 1 shield and roll 1 attack die. On a result, randomly flip 1 of your facedown Damage cards faceup and resolve it.

77c80304-78a4-4094-8d66-fe895ca2c0e4.name: C-3PO
77c80304-78a4-4094-8d66-fe895ca2c0e4.text:
Rebel only.

Once per round, before you roll 1 or more defense dice, you may guess aloud a number of results. If you roll that many results (before modifying dice), add 1 result.

71913913-ef92-4157-9206-1d0845f05a36.name: Single Turbolasers
71913913-ef92-4157-9206-1d0845f05a36.text: Attack (Energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack. The defender doubles his agility value against this attack. You may change 1 of your results to a result.

b95f5d90-6ada-448d-b96b-2477d69f1048.name: Quad Laser Cannons
b95f5d90-6ada-448d-b96b-2477d69f1048.text: Attack (Energy): Spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack. If this attack does not hit, you may immediately spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack again.

662b48df-0087-4fa6-bb77-40a19a7da307.name: Tibanna Gas Supplies
662b48df-0087-4fa6-bb77-40a19a7da307.text: Energy: You may discard this card to gain 3 energy.

9067b946-eac0-4a1d-a5fa-b23c3ff09865.name: Ionization Reactor
9067b946-eac0-4a1d-a5fa-b23c3ff09865.text: Energy: Spend 5 energy from this card and discard this card to cause each other ship at Range 1 to suffer 1 damage and receive 1 ion token.

168784b7-8c4f-4741-a0ac-22167ffa1ae3.name: Engine Booster
168784b7-8c4f-4741-a0ac-22167ffa1ae3.text: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver dial, you may spend 1 energy to execute a white ( 1) maneuver. You cannot use this ability if you would overlap another ship.

778f0549-1d55-474d-9389-33978e67da84.name: R3-A2
778f0549-1d55-474d-9389-33978e67da84.text: When you declare the target of your attack, if the defender is inside your firing arc, you may receive 1 stress token to cause the defender to receive 1 stress token.

fda6c2f6-2f08-4c72-ba29-d97fa8a729c0.name: R2-D6
fda6c2f6-2f08-4c72-ba29-d97fa8a729c0.text:
Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

You cannot equip this upgrade if you already have a upgrade icon or if your pilot skill value is "2" or lower.

4d5b2e52-2821-421b-a94c-ace045aeb3dc.name: Enhanced Scopes
4d5b2e52-2821-421b-a94c-ace045aeb3dc.text: During the Activation phase, treat your pilot skill value as "0".

af757783-1517-400e-808a-480f05a75cc6.name: Chardaan Refit
af757783-1517-400e-808a-480f05a75cc6.text:
A-Wing only.

This card has a negative squad point cost.

e59e1eb1-245a-4ca5-a692-8eabaf9eff90.name: Proton Rockets
e59e1eb1-245a-4ca5-a692-8eabaf9eff90.text:
Attack (Focus): Discard this card to perform this attack.

You may roll additional attack dice equal to your agility value, to a maximum of 3 additional dice.

5cd874d9-3fd7-41b9-a332-62618708d247.name: Kyle Katarn
5cd874d9-3fd7-41b9-a332-62618708d247.text:
Rebel only.

After you remove a stress token from your ship, you may assign a focus token to your ship.

148cb98f-03b9-4fd8-bfe1-d1a4343b73a6.name: Jan Ors
148cb98f-03b9-4fd8-bfe1-d1a4343b73a6.text:
Rebel only.

Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-3 performs a focus action or would be assigned a focus token, you may assign it an evade token instead.

64078724-6a69-4076-a5e0-bfe6232f6d88.name: Toryn Farr
64078724-6a69-4076-a5e0-bfe6232f6d88.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

Action: Spend any amount of energy to choose that many enemy ships at Range 1-2. Remove all focus, evade, and blue target lock tokens from those ships.

1484a32c-cb86-4d44-84c3-1ff96dd7ed10.name: R4-D6
1484a32c-cb86-4d44-84c3-1ff96dd7ed10.text: When you are hit by an attack and there are at least 3 uncanceled results, you may choose to cancel those results until there are 2 remaining. For each result canceled this way, receive 1 stress token.

231a436a-e1e1-4bdd-8744-db614a56a10e.name: R5-P9
231a436a-e1e1-4bdd-8744-db614a56a10e.text: At the end of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 of your focus tokens to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

ba2a4a4d-f756-4ed3-a9b3-ea651fd787be.name: WED-15 Repair Droid
ba2a4a4d-f756-4ed3-a9b3-ea651fd787be.text:
Huge Ship only.

Action: Spend 1 energy to discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards, or spend 3 energy to discard 1 of your faceup Damage cards.

eb1091be-bd99-40a1-9068-32ac4905da49.name: Carlist Rieekan
eb1091be-bd99-40a1-9068-32ac4905da49.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to treat each friendly ship's pilot skill value as "12" until the end of the phase.

a5759da1-a813-44dc-85d2-a31c6319204c.name: Jan Dodonna
a5759da1-a813-44dc-85d2-a31c6319204c.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking, it may change 1 of its results to a .

38901cc0-4ab5-45a3-b44c-455c181cd346.name: Expanded Cargo Hold
38901cc0-4ab5-45a3-b44c-455c181cd346.text:
GR-75 only.

Once per round, when you would be dealt a faceup Damage card, you may draw that card from either the fore or aft Damage deck.

1d31ad74-be84-4c44-a26d-54155362df73.name: Backup Shield Generator
1d31ad74-be84-4c44-a26d-54155362df73.text: At the end of each round, you may spend 1 energy to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

e34171c6-92ed-4fa8-8cb6-1384eff0137f.name: EM Emitter
e34171c6-92ed-4fa8-8cb6-1384eff0137f.text: When you obstruct an attack, the defender rolls 3 additional defense dice (instead of 1).

b8a80690-613b-445f-b649-5c5765d78bb8.name: Frequency Jammer
b8a80690-613b-445f-b649-5c5765d78bb8.text: When you perform a jam action, choose 1 enemy ship that does not have a stress token and is at Range 1 of the jammed ship.  The chosen ship receives 1 stress token.

25520692-aefa-4a31-b4df-31963c8e6e8d.name: Han Solo
25520692-aefa-4a31-b4df-31963c8e6e8d.text:
Rebel only.

When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend that target lock to change all of your results to results.

cd948e42-51a8-4dc1-a9ed-ab35c3b4acf8.name: Leia Organa
cd948e42-51a8-4dc1-a9ed-ab35c3b4acf8.text:
Rebel only.

At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to allow all friendly ships that reveal a red maneuver to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the phase.

c35922fc-f3e6-473c-8d9c-2458dced6e72.name: Targeting Coordinator
c35922fc-f3e6-473c-8d9c-2458dced6e72.text: Energy: You may spend 1 energy to choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Acquire a target lock, then assign the blue target lock token to the chosen ship.

67a741f6-6c1f-4875-bb01-31856df7562f.name: Raymus Antilles
67a741f6-6c1f-4875-bb01-31856df7562f.text:
Huge Ship only. Rebel only.

At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-3. You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver. If the maneuver is white, assign that ship 1 stress token.

aeccb9ee-f05e-4bd0-a663-fafbe48ecd09.name: Gunnery Team
aeccb9ee-f05e-4bd0-a663-fafbe48ecd09.text: Once per round, when attacking with a secondary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to change 1 of your blank results to a result.

de13efd7-a956-4a1d-86a6-3fdbd8dd0994.name: Sensor Team
de13efd7-a956-4a1d-86a6-3fdbd8dd0994.text: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-5 instead of 1-3.

87db8ad3-8377-4096-9130-8b37e4bea6c2.name: Engineering Team
87db8ad3-8377-4096-9130-8b37e4bea6c2.text: During the Activation phase, when you reveal a maneuver, gain 1 additional energy during the "Gain Energy" step.

e9a662da-3ff1-4723-bec0-eb374490ea66.name: Lando Calrissian
e9a662da-3ff1-4723-bec0-eb374490ea66.text:
Rebel only.

Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each result, assign 1 focus token to your ship. For each result, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

c2d841f4-f358-42b0-b1a5-2cd106d2d5a6.name: Mara Jade
c2d841f4-f358-42b0-b1a5-2cd106d2d5a6.text:
Imperial only.

At the end of the Combat phase, each enemy ship at Range 1 that does not have a stress token receives 1 stress token.

11e20784-72bf-4b26-8825-1b888736df19.name: Fleet Officer
11e20784-72bf-4b26-8825-1b888736df19.text:
Imperial only.

Action: Choose up to 2 friendly ships within Range 1-2 and assign 1 focus token to each of those ships. Then receive 1 stress token.

676272cc-016b-481c-abaa-69d4bf86b4a2.name: Stay On Target
676272cc-016b-481c-abaa-69d4bf86b4a2.text:
When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same speed.

Treat that maneuver as a red maneuver.

c1146dcd-2c5f-4a3e-81d4-b11dd8088a68.name: Dash Rendar
c1146dcd-2c5f-4a3e-81d4-b11dd8088a68.text:
Rebel only.

You may perform attacks while overlapping an obstacle.

Your attacks cannot be obstructed.

9c9891ea-f95c-4635-b788-bd7801036a39.name: Lone Wolf
9c9891ea-f95c-4635-b788-bd7801036a39.text: When attacking or defending, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, you may reroll 1 of your blank results.

4018d448-f2f3-4674-af3b-e402a38ed474.name: "Leebo"
4018d448-f2f3-4674-af3b-e402a38ed474.text:
Rebel only.

Action: Perform a free boost action. Then receive 1 ion token.

aa522211-30d8-450c-91da-1c302c951502.name: Ruthlessness
aa522211-30d8-450c-91da-1c302c951502.text:
Imperial only.

After you perform an attack that hits, you must choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender (other than yourself). That ship suffers 1 damage.

336a5faa-1193-43e7-a11d-33b33f24e44b.name: Intimidation
336a5faa-1193-43e7-a11d-33b33f24e44b.text: While you are touching an enemy ship, reduce that ship's agility value by 1.

b25e5b2f-740b-4443-bf27-582a0dde3486.name: Ysanne Isard
b25e5b2f-740b-4443-bf27-582a0dde3486.text:
Imperial only.

At the start of the Combat phase, if you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to your ship, you may perform a free evade action.

e4798251-c6bb-4d15-b8a8-4748a437f219.name: Moff Jerjerrod
e4798251-c6bb-4d15-b8a8-4748a437f219.text:
Imperial only.

When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard this Upgrade card or another Upgrade card to flip that Damage card facedown (without resolving its effect).

9571d906-8085-45ce-9201-3daf3110ad8a.name: Ion Torpedoes
9571d906-8085-45ce-9201-3daf3110ad8a.text:
Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, the defender and each ship at Range 1 of it receives 1 ion token.

fc3469b7-7e84-43c4-9155-b68736f3bc1c.name: Bodyguard
fc3469b7-7e84-43c4-9155-b68736f3bc1c.text:
Scum only.

At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend a focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1 with higher pilot skill than you. Increase its agility value by 1 until the end of the round.

6a51132d-ac8d-4661-b909-07dc8c42c16a.name: Calc???
6a51132d-ac8d-4661-b909-07dc8c42c16a.text: This card has not yet been revealed.

c4107a37-ee45-4ef8-9398-b5d93d3701f6.name: Accuracy Corrector
c4107a37-ee45-4ef8-9398-b5d93d3701f6.text:
When attacking, you may cancel all dice results. Then, you may add 2 results.

Your dice cannot be modified again during this attack.

ce4d14ba-a7e8-4b52-a288-2d436f93f605.name: Inertial Dampeners
ce4d14ba-a7e8-4b52-a288-2d436f93f605.text: When you reveal your maneuver, you may discard this card to instead perform a white [0] maneuver. Then receive 1 stress token.

7635f18e-91a0-4a01-a189-953d9c5d02a9.name: Flechette Cannon
7635f18e-91a0-4a01-a189-953d9c5d02a9.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and, if the defender is not stressed, it also receives 1 stress token. Then cancel all dice results.

9f72eda8-05a8-4ceb-b5fa-850704032dfe.name: "Mangler" Cannon
9f72eda8-05a8-4ceb-b5fa-850704032dfe.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

When attacking, you may change 1 of your results to a result.

110a25cc-adb2-43e3-a29e-ee863c95b861.name: Dead Man's Switch
110a25cc-adb2-43e3-a29e-ee863c95b861.text: When you are destroyed, each ship at Range 1 suffers 1 damage.

184f5734-0745-4611-bd6c-0e8e35f61aba.name: Feedback Array
184f5734-0745-4611-bd6c-0e8e35f61aba.text: During the Combat phase, instead of performing any attacks, you may receive 1 ion token and suffer 1 damage to choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1.  That ship suffers 1 damage.

ef0875e1-eaa4-4814-8449-1570ab8f9850.name: "Hot Shot" Blaster
ef0875e1-eaa4-4814-8449-1570ab8f9850.text: Attack: Discard this card to attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

5346d8d0-16d9-4020-b191-8ba80eccad72.name: Greedo
5346d8d0-16d9-4020-b191-8ba80eccad72.text:
Scum only.

The first time you attack each round and the first time you defend each round, the first Damage card dealt is dealt faceup.

ede38b9d-503f-445e-a378-11845234d4db.name: Salvaged Astromech
ede38b9d-503f-445e-a378-11845234d4db.text:
When you are dealt a Damage card with the Ship trait, you may immediately discard that card (before resolving its effect).

Then, discard this Upgrade card.

8bd9263c-8687-4191-ad70-d65b68d3b54e.name: Bomb Loadout
8bd9263c-8687-4191-ad70-d65b68d3b54e.text:
Y-Wing only.

Your upgrade bar gains the icon.

3775301f-d07a-4237-afa1-945aceeb736d.name: "Genius"
3775301f-d07a-4237-afa1-945aceeb736d.text: If you are equipped with a bomb that can be dropped before you reveal your maneuver, you may drop the bomb after you execute your maneuver instead.

8ef2d476-42e1-48f0-a50c-f94aff9880ba.name: Unhinged Astromech
8ef2d476-42e1-48f0-a50c-f94aff9880ba.text: You may treat all 3-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

dd37673f-f38f-47cb-aeda-54f011ae6f94.name: R4-B11
dd37673f-f38f-47cb-aeda-54f011ae6f94.text: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all defense dice. The defender must reroll the chosen dice.

0c70114a-1d17-44f0-9a0a-fa20b4d1e017.name: Autoblaster Turret
0c70114a-1d17-44f0-9a0a-fa20b4d1e017.text:
Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

Your results cannot be canceled by defense dice. The defender may cancel results before results.

86481235-4195-4a20-92f0-063313205408.name: R4 Agromech
86481235-4195-4a20-92f0-063313205408.text: When attacking, after you spend a focus token, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

805f0e82-983d-402b-b7f9-e30b4d4a2d82.name: K4 Security Droid
805f0e82-983d-402b-b7f9-e30b4d4a2d82.text: After executing a green maneuver, you may acquire a target lock.

2a565dd1-2421-4843-9f08-e888a9f1bc4a.name: Outlaw Tech
2a565dd1-2421-4843-9f08-e888a9f1bc4a.text: After you execute a red maneuver, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

0933689b-0387-4ecf-852d-d2e336935aca.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
0933689b-0387-4ecf-852d-d2e336935aca.text:
TIE Advanced only.

When attacking with your primary weapon, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may add 1 result to your roll. If you do, you cannot spend target locks during this attack.

8bda9fe1-0d26-4ace-9d66-52b3dc7bb1e9.name: Ion Cannon Battery
8bda9fe1-0d26-4ace-9d66-52b3dc7bb1e9.text: Attack (energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 critical damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

1ec710d5-2cd1-486c-9efb-a0c48c6fccfe.name: Stealth Device
1ec710d5-2cd1-486c-9efb-a0c48c6fccfe.text: Increase your agility value by 1.  If you are hit by an attack, discard this card.

8446374d-0a5d-4b97-a1f0-02acc490f5e4.name: Engine Upgrade
8446374d-0a5d-4b97-a1f0-02acc490f5e4.text: Your action bar gains the action icon.

4528cae3-f7a5-4095-8619-e3781501a9ec.name: Anti-Pursuit Lasers
4528cae3-f7a5-4095-8619-e3781501a9ec.text:
Large Ship only.

After an enemy ship executes a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die. On a or result, the enemy ship suffers 1 damage.

bb4fbdac-4fe4-4920-a041-23f92a515924.name: Targeting Computer
bb4fbdac-4fe4-4920-a041-23f92a515924.text: Your action bar gains the action icon.

360bc7a5-2554-4f33-8059-f825f7e43939.name: Munitions Failsafe
360bc7a5-2554-4f33-8059-f825f7e43939.text: When attacking with a secondary weapon that instructs you to discard it to perform the attack, do not discard it unless the attack hits.

cb0b2f88-6c87-43b2-b351-dbf60f99d277.name: Stygium Particle Accelerator
cb0b2f88-6c87-43b2-b351-dbf60f99d277.text: When you either decloak or perform a cloak action, you may perform a free evade action.

616566e9-207b-4edb-90b9-61234447d58b.name: Advanced Cloaking Device
616566e9-207b-4edb-90b9-61234447d58b.text:
TIE Phantom only.

After you perform an attack, you may perform a free cloak action.

6de39218-e8bf-4ff4-b2b6-c8810361e6e8.name: Combat Retrofit
6de39218-e8bf-4ff4-b2b6-c8810361e6e8.text:
GR-75 only.

Increase your hull value by 2 and your shield value by 1.

26e1552d-4fef-4501-a816-a9bea7375a1d.name: B-Wing/E2
26e1552d-4fef-4501-a816-a9bea7375a1d.text:
B-Wing only.

Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

23d0434a-bf2d-42c0-80a8-068a8e50f72b.name: Countermeasures
23d0434a-bf2d-42c0-80a8-068a8e50f72b.text:
Large Ship only.

At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card to increase your agility value by 1 until the end of the round. Then you may remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

6f491350-f8bb-45a8-a4c2-a85dcc4aa043.name: Experimental Interface
6f491350-f8bb-45a8-a4c2-a85dcc4aa043.text: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action from an equipped Upgrade card with the "Action:" header. Then receive 1 stress token.

30dbbd19-e110-483e-aef7-a5fa239aefcc.name: Tactical Jammer
30dbbd19-e110-483e-aef7-a5fa239aefcc.text:
Large Ship only.

Your ship can obstruct enemy attacks.

36747135-1961-45cf-8f24-bbcdadbfd60a.name: Autothrusters
36747135-1961-45cf-8f24-bbcdadbfd60a.text: When defending, if you are beyond Range 2 or outside the attacker's firing arc, you may change 1 of your blank results to a result. You can equip this card only if you have the action icon.

b80273ae-9809-4801-a170-3cf3b2e12dce.name: Slave I
b80273ae-9809-4801-a170-3cf3b2e12dce.text:
Firespray-31 only.

Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

aef1dedd-ae7f-4adc-b3c6-368a7177f895.name: Millennium Falcon
aef1dedd-ae7f-4adc-b3c6-368a7177f895.text:
YT-1300 only.

Your action bar gains the action icon.

6ffd81c1-e7a5-4142-b58a-0592d3117dc9.name: Moldy Crow
6ffd81c1-e7a5-4142-b58a-0592d3117dc9.text:
HWK-290 only.

During the End phase, do not remove unused focus tokens from your ship.

ca4d132c-e891-4130-8984-0b48ff89a866.name: ST-321
ca4d132c-e891-4130-8984-0b48ff89a866.text:
Lambda-class Shuttle only.

When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto any enemy ship in the play area.

1254be91-3ae9-4d07-b678-2096b6313fc4.name: Royal Guard TIE
1254be91-3ae9-4d07-b678-2096b6313fc4.text:
TIE Interceptor only.

You may equip up to 2 different Modification upgrades (instead of 1).

You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "4" or lower.

7607bafe-718b-4151-8ec5-97a1e635da31.name: Dodonna's Pride
7607bafe-718b-4151-8ec5-97a1e635da31.text:
CR90 fore section only.

When you perform a coordinate action, you may choose 2 friendly ships (instead of 1). Those ships may each perform 1 free action.

c7eaa886-065a-4eab-a6d0-59881e418e88.name: A-Wing Test Pilot
c7eaa886-065a-4eab-a6d0-59881e418e88.text:
A-Wing only.

Your upgrade bar gains 1 upgrade icon.

You cannot equip 2 of the same Upgrade cards. You cannot equip this if your pilot skill value is "1" or lower.

250bd245-e986-45d8-9a6b-fcec8428e3eb.name: Tantive IV
250bd245-e986-45d8-9a6b-fcec8428e3eb.text:
CR90 fore section only.

Your fore section upgrade bar gains 1 additional and 1 additional upgrade icon.

fb1a1698-ce57-4bfc-b6f2-a22d2d1ead7e.name: Bright Hope
fb1a1698-ce57-4bfc-b6f2-a22d2d1ead7e.text:
GR-75 only.

A reinforce action assigned to your fore section adds 2 results (instead of 1).

5f394607-fd08-484e-a220-dfc904537a6c.name: Quantum Storm
5f394607-fd08-484e-a220-dfc904537a6c.text:
GR-75 only.

At the start of the End phase, if you have 1 or fewer energy tokens, gain 1 energy token.

c45e8328-384d-42cc-ad61-ed5a4471ed67.name: Dutyfree
c45e8328-384d-42cc-ad61-ed5a4471ed67.text:
GR-75 only.

When performing a jam action, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1-3 (instead of at Range 1-2).

d9eb2735-e50b-4111-b835-f34f6ea906b5.name: Jaina's Light
d9eb2735-e50b-4111-b835-f34f6ea906b5.text:
CR90 fore section only.

When defending, once per attack, if you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard it and draw another faceup Damage card.

8f7c9057-3ae6-4950-8d54-d3ea344b4395.name: Outrider
8f7c9057-3ae6-4950-8d54-d3ea344b4395.text:
YT-2400 only.

While you have a Upgrade card equipped, you cannot perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform secondary weapon attacks against ships outside your firing arc.

be47dc64-5a77-4a64-a2bc-d9b485a760d1.name: Dauntless
be47dc64-5a77-4a64-a2bc-d9b485a760d1.text:
VT-49 Decimator only.

After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform 1 free action. Then receive 1 stress token.

d1efcc27-384b-4de2-80e1-a5e9ae8db889.name: Virago
d1efcc27-384b-4de2-80e1-a5e9ae8db889.text:
StarViper only.

Your upgrade bar gains the and upgrade icons.

You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "3" or lower.

6e7bdd77-0ad0-43dc-ba39-ae3fa5c24fa0.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor (Cannon)
6e7bdd77-0ad0-43dc-ba39-ae3fa5c24fa0.text:
M3-A Interceptor only.

Your upgrade bar gains the , , or upgrade icon.

3dc6b0b8-d10c-42f7-8d41-a01d103a9ade.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor (Torpedo)
3dc6b0b8-d10c-42f7-8d41-a01d103a9ade.text:
M3-A Interceptor only.

Your upgrade bar gains the , , or upgrade icon.

8af59c16-5a76-4d13-acb5-5bc50f6cd309.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor (Missile)
8af59c16-5a76-4d13-acb5-5bc50f6cd309.text:
M3-A Interceptor only.

Your upgrade bar gains the , , or upgrade icon.

7e28fa74-a3b8-47ab-b281-b41929ba03d9.name: IG-2000
7e28fa74-a3b8-47ab-b281-b41929ba03d9.text:
Aggressor only.

You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

fab34d16-8dda-4f0a-9b59-879b9c512162.name: BTL-A4 Y-Wing
fab34d16-8dda-4f0a-9b59-879b9c512162.text:
Y-Wing only.

You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a secondary weapon.

646bde80-0d7a-4a81-a99b-28096a4742b4.name: Andrasta
646bde80-0d7a-4a81-a99b-28096a4742b4.text: Your upgrade bar gains two additional upgrade icons.

6d428f9d-feb6-418e-a613-bf7b50d61604.name: TIE/x1
6d428f9d-feb6-418e-a613-bf7b50d61604.text:
TIE Advanced only.

Your upgrade bar gains the upgrade icon.

If you equip a upgrade, its squad point cost is reduced by 4 (to a minimum of 0).
